code: @Bean @ConditionalOnMissingBean @ConditionalOnBean(WebHandler.class) public WebTestClient webTestClient(ApplicationContext applicationContext, List<WebTestClientBuilderCustomizer> customizers, List<MockServerConfigurer> configurers) {     WebTestClient.MockServerSpec<?> mockServerSpec = WebTestClient.bindToApplicationContext(applicationContext).     for (MockServerConfigurer configurer : configurers) {         mockServerSpec.apply(configurer).     }     WebTestClient.Builder builder = mockServerSpec.configureClient().     for (WebTestClientBuilderCustomizer customizer : customizers) {         customizer.customize(builder).     }     return builder.build(). }
